Communications and News                       Publishing and Printing                       Digital Communications                       Multimedia                       Marketing and Advertising                       Photo Services                       University Identity                       Video Marketing and Communications                                                                   Publishing and Printing         For your publishing and printing needs, resources including Copy Central and the Office of Advertising & Publications offer services to help you design, professionally finish, reprint and even digitally publish your projects. On-staff experts and designers and the latest publishing and printing technologies are available to university employees and students. To find about NYU’s creative, copy and media services, contact Copy Central or the Office of Advertising & Publications or visit their websites.               Copies   Copying and duplicating should be simple, accessible and affordable. That’s why Copy Central offers quick copy services and color laser copying, servicing your last-minute rush jobs as well as your more sophisticated color designs. Copy Central’s simple chargeback to your departmental budget minimizes administrative paper work, and avoids the administrative costs associated with paying commercial suppliers. For information on printing course packs, copyright compliance, copying services and pricing, contact Copy Central .       For copying convenience at locations across the NYU campus, several university buildings have their own copy centers that can be accessed by NYU employees and students. Bobst Library, the Stern School of Business and the Polytechnic Institute of NYU have their own copy centers, as do many university departments. For information on their copying services and payment methods, visit their websites.             Media   Copy Central’s services go beyond printing on paper. It also offers digital publishing services. Its DocuTech™ digital publishing systems capture text, line art, and photographs by scanning and converting them to digital masters. Contact Copy Central for more information its digital publishing capabilities.     Do you need assistance with your digital publishing projects? Copy Central provides print job preparation and output services, including electronic file translation and digital printing from your electronic illustration and layout files.           Creative Services (Design, etc.)   From business reports to brochures, the Office of Advertising & Publications and the NYU Design Group at Copy Central offer a full range of creative design services. Copy Central’s graphic design capabilities include print communications (brochures, manuals, reports), information design (charts, graphs, schedules) and promotional design (posters, signs, direct mail). Contact Copy Central for estimates and more information about its graphic design services. Contact the Office of Advertising & Publications for information about its graphic design services for both print and online communications.      Whether it’s print buying, bindery or finishing, Copy Central and the Office of Advertising & Publishing are equipped to make sure your printing is done affordably with high quality professional finish. For your print buying needs, Copy Central will take care of bidding and place your printing project with the right commercial source. Copy Central also offers a full range of bindery and finishing services, from collating to folding to lamination. For more information about its print buying, bindery and finishing services, visit the Copy Central website .       The Office of Advertising & Publishing’s services include publishing production and print procurement. Contact its office or visit its website for more information.     Members of the NYU community can use Copy Central to print university stationery and business cards. Employees must use the standard, university-wide template when getting stationery or business cards printed, available at Copy Central. Contact Copy Central or visit its website for information about ordering your business cards or stationery.     Is your projected printed and finished? Copy Central and the Office of Advertising & Publications offer fulfillment services including addressing, mailing and delivery. Whether it’s internal or external mailing, Copy Central will fold, insert and address your printed materials for delivery. The Office of Advertising & Publication includes mailing as part of its communication and printing services. For pricing and more information about their fulfillment services, contact Copy Central or the Office of Advertising & Publications .     For custom projects and premiums , contact the Office of Advertising & Publication or Copy Central.                                    Copy Central For services ranging from copying to design to addressing and mailing, Copy Central is a valuable publishing and printing resource.               Copy Central Services      Graphic Design & Typesetting    Copying & Duplicating    Digital Preparation & Output    Digital Publishing                       Advertising & Publications The Office of A & P is equipped to help with creative services, copying, printing and more. Symposium    Fashion           Visit    Directions and Maps                                             < Back to Events List                                                   Share       Delicious     Digg This     Reddit        Stumble Upon     Technorati     Twitter        Facebook     Windows Live     Yahoo                 MySpace     Email                   Bread Crumbs                Home          >           Events Calendar          >           Agenting Done Right: A Roundtable and Lunch with Leslie Siebert from Gersh                                                                Agenting Done Right: A Roundtable and Lunch with Leslie Siebert from Gersh   Jan 29, 2015                                   | 12:30 PM-2:00 PM                                      Join us for lunch and conversation with Gallatin parent Leslie Siebert , a senior managing partner at Gersh​, one of Hollywood’s top agencies. Siebert heads the talent division, which boasts an award-winning client list that includes Taylor Schilling, Hilary Duff, Allison Janney, Jeffrey Tambor, Angela Bassett, Catherine Keener, Deborah Messing, Archie Panjabi, Julia Ormond, Michael Ealy, John Corbett, David Schwimmer, Madeleine Stowe, and Jeanne Tripplehorn—and many other luminaries from the small and the large screen. Hear about her 30 years of leadership​ at Gersh ​and ​about the tools she used to cultivate favorable relationships ​with her roster of celebrated clients.                                Date + Time      Jan 29, 2015                                   | 12:30 PM-2:00 PM              Location      1 Washington Place, Room 527 New York, NY 10003                        Contact            Lauren at lnisenson@nyu.edu / 212.992.9868                      Open to Public?                no                         RSVP      RSVP                                               top of page                               RSVP                                                                                    NYU Gallatin Footer              Gallatin School of Individualized Study     1 Washington Place     New York, NY 10003     (212) 998-7370                   A–Z Index      Directions      Contact Us      Job Opportunities               News      Support Gallatin      Feedback                         Follow us on Facebook      Follow us on Twitter      Follow us on Youtube         Follow us Instagram                 Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright NYU Gallatin.
